Country.description: A geopolitical entity representing a country or dependent territory

code.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code for the country

iso3Code.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code for the country

localeId.description: The Unicode locale identifier for the country

shortName.description: The short name for the country

sortIndex.description: The sort index for the country

sovereignState.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code for the sovereign state the country is associated with

Language.description: A systematic use of sounds, characters, symbols or signs to communicate meaning

code.description: The ISO 639-1 alpha-2 code for the language

iso3Code.description: The ISO 639-2 alpha-3 code for the language

localeId.description: The Unicode locale identifier for the language

shortName.description: The short name for the language

sortIndex.description: The sort index for the language

code.description: The code for the measurement system

description.description: The description for the measurement system

localeId.description: The Unicode locale identifier for the measurement system

name.description: The name of the measurement system

sortIndex.description: The sort index for the measurement system

MeasurementUnit.description: A type of unit of measurement

code.description: The code for the measurement unit

description.description: The description for the measurement unit

localeId.description: The Unicode locale identifier for the measurement unit

name.description: The name of the measurement unit

sortIndex.description: The sort index for the measurement unit

system.description: The code for the measurement system

type.description: The code for the measurement unit type

MeasurementUnitType.description: A type of unit of measurement

code.description: The code for the measurement unit type

description.description: The description for the measurement unit type

localeId.description: The Unicode locale identifier for the measurement unit type

name.description: The name of the measurement unit type

sortIndex.description: The sort index for the measurement unit type

ProblemDetails.description: A problem details object, as defined by RFC 7807, which holds the information for an error returned by an API

code.description: The optional error code associated with the problem

detail.description: The human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

parameter.description: The optional name of the parameter associated with the problem

stackTrace.description: The optional stack trace generated by the origin server for the problem

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem

timestamp.description: The date and time the problem occurred

title.description: The short, human-readable summary of the problem type; it should not change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization

type.description: The URI reference that identifies the problem type

validationErrors.description: The optional validation errors associated with the problem

Region.description: An area, especially part of a country or the world having definable characteristics but not always fixed boundaries

code.description: The ISO 3166-2 subdivision code for the region

country.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code for the country the region is associated with

localeId.description: The Unicode locale identifier for the region

sortIndex.description: The sort index for the region

description.description: The description for the time zone

id.description: The ID for the time zone

localeId.description: The Unicode locale identifier for the time zone

name.description: The name of the time zone

sortIndex.description: The sort index for the time zone

message.description: The error message for the validation error

property.description: The path for the property that resulted in the validation error
